name: CBS Indicator
description: Make it very obvious when someone's using CBS

gp-indicator.name: Show Gameplay Indicator
gp-indicator.description: Shows an indicator on the top-left (or your desired position) that appears when you're using CBS or CoS

gp-position.name: Position
gp-position.description: The position of the gameplay indicator

gp-opacity.name: Opacity
gp-opacity.description: The opacity of the gameplay indicator (0 -> 255)

end-watermark.name: Show Endscreen Indicator
end-watermark.description:
Shows a watermark on the top-right (or your desired position) that appears when you're using CBS or CoS
Similar to the watermark in the CBF mod

end-wm-position.name: Position
end-wm-position.description: The position of the endscreen indicator

end-custom-text.name: Custom Endscreen Text
end-custom-text.description: Changes the text on the endscreen when using CBS or CoS

end-text-cbs.name: CBS Text
end-text-cbs.description: The text that appears when completing a level with CBS

end-text-cos.name: CoS Text
end-text-cos.description: The text that appears when completing a level with CoS
